text: Ronald Tapiwa Pfumbidzai (born 25 December 1994) is a Zimbabwean footballer. He plays as a defender for SuperSport United and the Zimbabwe national football team. As a youth player, he was the team captain in the 2013 COSAFA U-20 Cup. He also played in the 2015 Africa U-23 Cup of Nations qualifiers. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:2019 Africa Cup of Nations players Category:Zimbabwean footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:People from Harare
title: Ronald Pfumbidzai
